meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be upgraded.
meanings.sent1: The upgradability of this software allows for easy updates.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the upgradability of my phone, as it means I can add new features.
meanings.sent3: The robot's upgradability made it the envy of all the other machines.
meanings.sent4: Her upgradability in learning new languages was like a superpower.
meanings.sent5: The upgradability of the car's engine made it a top choice for mechanics.

meanings.definition: The ability to improve or enhance a product or system by adding new features or components.
meanings.sent1: We value the upgradability of our computers to keep them running smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The upgradability of the software allows for constant innovation.
meanings.sent3: The upgradability of the game console turned a regular gaming session into an adventure.
meanings.sent4: His upgradability in problem-solving made him a valuable team member.
meanings.sent5: The upgradability of the house with new technology made it a futuristic marvel.
